name: Delta Leonardo Bike Storage Rack
description: Super convenient single bike storage. Subtle, silver colour and minimalist design makes it suitable in almost any room. Ideal for small apartments and townhouses.Mounts vertically on any wall.Holds most wheel sizes securely.Please note: Must be mounted directly to wall joists or studs for secure storage.Holds a bike weighing up to 18kg.May not fit some oversize mountain bike tires.
